Game Overview
Set during the height of World War II, Soldiers: Heroes of World War II challenges players to prove their tactical skills and decision-making under pressure. This game delivers a deep tactical experience, where the player commands elite commando squads on some of the most dangerous missions behind enemy lines.
Leading a small unit requires thoughtful use of cover, vehicles, and weaponry. The game‚Äôs environments are almost entirely destructible, allowing players to reshape the battlefield in real time. With limited resources and no reinforcements, only tactical brilliance leads to victory.

Trailer

Key Features

Tactical Gameplay with a Limited Squad
Players control a small group of soldiers where every unit matters‚Äîlosing even one can be critical.
Direct Control System
A unique mechanic allowing players to manually aim and control any unit, including vehicles, for precise combat actions.
Fully Destructible Environments
Every object on the map‚Äîfrom bushes and fences to buildings and vehicles‚Äîcan serve as cover, and be destroyed to shift the tide of battle.
Targeted Vehicle Damage
Players can aim at weak spots, such as a tank‚Äôs tracks, to immobilize enemy units.
Realistic Ballistics
Factors like armor penetration, angle of impact, and ricochets influence combat outcomes.
Vehicle Capture and Repair
Abandoned or damaged vehicles can be fixed and brought back into action.
Inventory System
Ammunition is limited. Players can scavenge weapons, grenades, and ammo from fallen allies and enemies or looted vehicles.
Smart Enemy AI
Enemies react to sound and movement, use cover, coordinate with each other, and set ambushes.
Wide Arsenal
Over 25 types of weapons, including rifles, machine guns, grenades, flamethrowers, and anti-tank gear.
Targeted Vehicle Damage
Players can aim at weak spots, such as a tank‚Äôs tracks, to immobilize enemy units.
Realistic Ballistics
Factors like armor penetration, angle of impact, and ricochets influence combat outcomes.
Vehicle Capture and Repair
Abandoned or damaged vehicles can be fixed and brought back into action.
Open Modding Tools
Full access to resources for creating and distributing mods.

2025 Update

In 2025, Soldiers: Heroes of World War II received a major update that enhanced modern system support and added new content:
  • Full compatibility with Windows 10 and removal of StarForce DRM for improved stability.
  • Updated multiplayer with full Steam integration.
  • Enhanced editor for map and mission creation.
  • Steam Workshop support for mod creation and sharing.
  • Improved graphics and performance, now using DirectX 9 with widescreen support.
  • Added Steam Achievements and digital collectibles: Trading Cards, Profile Backgrounds, Badges, Emoticons.
